name: Donegal Group, Inc.
description: Donegal Group, Inc. is a regional property and casualty insurance company headquartered in Marietta, Pennsylvania. Founded in 1889, the company provides a range of insurance products, including personal auto, homeowners, and commercial lines. Donegal aims to deliver quality insurance coverage and exceptional customer service through its network of independent agents. The company operates mainly in the Northeastern and Midwestern United States, offering tailored solutions to meet the needs of individuals and businesses alike. Donegal is committed to maintaining a strong financial position, ensuring that it can fulfill its obligations to policyholders. The company operates through several subsidiaries, including Donegal Mutual Insurance Company and Atlantic States Insurance Company, which help to enhance its operational efficiency and expand its market reach. Donegal Group focuses on leveraging technology and innovation to improve the customer experience and streamline its processes. With an emphasis on building long-term relationships with its agents and customers, Donegal Group continues to grow and adapt in the competitive insurance landscape, striving to uphold its mission of providing reliable protection and peace of mind.

seo.meta_title: Donegal Group, Inc. | Regional Insurance Provider
seo.meta_description: Explore Donegal Group, Inc., a regional property and casualty insurance company providing tailored insurance solutions for individuals and businesses since 1889.

faq.question: What types of insurance does Donegal Group offer?
faq.answer: Donegal Group offers personal auto, homeowners, and commercial insurance products.

faq.question: Where is Donegal Group headquartered?
faq.answer: Donegal Group is headquartered in Marietta, Pennsylvania, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Donegal Group?
faq.answer: Kevin G. McCarthy is the CEO of Donegal Group, Inc.
